name: v0.7
body:
```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

# https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_docker/#setup
# http_archive("io_bazel_rules_docker", ...)

http_archive(
    name = "io_bazel_rules_k8s",
    sha256 = "ce5b9bc0926681e2e7f2147b49096f143e6cbc783e71bc1d4f36ca76b00e6f4a",
    strip_prefix = "rules_k8s-0.7",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/archive/refs/tags/v0.7.tar.gz"],
)

load("@io_bazel_rules_k8s//k8s:k8s.bzl", "k8s_repositories")

k8s_repositories()

load("@io_bazel_rules_k8s//k8s:k8s_go_deps.bzl", k8s_go_deps = "deps")

k8s_go_deps()
```

## What's Changed
* Update dependency rules_python to v0.0.3 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/612
* Update dependency com_github_grpc_grpc to v1.32.0 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/611
* Update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.22.2 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/613
* Update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.24.3 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/614
* Update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.24.4 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/617
* Update dependency rules_python to v0.1.0 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/618
* Add s390x support by @srajmane in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/615
* Update dependency build_bazel_rules_nodejs to v2.3.0 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/616
* Make the kubectl toolchain type public by @person142 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/624
* Remove broken HTTP E2E test by @chases2 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/650
* Add support for Bazel 3.0.0 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/639
* Fix e2e tests by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/655
* fix gazelle by @mariusgrigoriu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/626
* Add Tink AB to list of adopters by @Sebelino in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/635
* Allow rules_k8s targets to be invoked within other Bazel targets by @EdSchouten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/634
* Resolver library by @mariusgrigoriu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/628
* Add kubectl toolchain for linux arm64 by @fengye87 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/644
* Update rules_docker by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/656
* Set .bazelversion to 3.0.0 by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/657
* Create image with both bazel 3.5.0 and 3.0.0 by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/658
* Update dependency com_google_protobuf to v3.15.8 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/622
* Update dependency rules_python to v0.2.0 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/661
* Update dependency com_github_grpc_grpc to v1.37.1 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/619
* Update dependency build_bazel_rules_nodejs to v2.3.3 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/625
* Use bazel 3.5.0 by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/659
* Drop support for ubuntu 16 by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/662
* Add Cookies to Adopters list by @sgammon in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/663
* Create image with bazel 4.1.0 and 3.5.0 by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/664
* Update rules_docker to v0.20.0 by @mishas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/669
* Enable wrapping k8s_objects diff exit codes by @irlevesque in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/680
* Do not use constraints from bazel_tools by @limdor in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/675
* Added toolchain support for Apple M1 and made toolchain_type public to allow extensions by @lomeshpatel in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/697
* Support 5.2.0 by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/699
* Fix buildifier files by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/700
* Drop nodejs, java examples by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/701
* Remove cc from WORKSPACE, gcloud-bazel/BUILD by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/702
* Drop jsonnet complexity by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/703
* Delete unused .ci files by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/706
* Use common args by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/707
* Drop proto complexity by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/704
* Update README with updated macos toolchains by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/705
* Update multiple dependency versions. by @mishas in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/673
* Make go_version an argument to deps() by @fejta in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/708
* Add ParseTagOption to k8s/go/pkg/resolver by @gonzojive in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/698

## New Contributors
* @srajmane made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/615
* @person142 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/624
* @chases2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/650
* @UebelAndre made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/639
* @Sebelino made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/635
* @EdSchouten made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/634
* @fengye87 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/644
* @sgammon made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/663
* @mishas made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/669
* @irlevesque made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/680
* @limdor made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/675
* @lomeshpatel made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/697
* @gonzojive made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/pull/698

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/compare/v0.6...v0.7

name: v0.6
body:
* Added a `.diff` target

* Dependency upgrades
  * nodejs to v2.0.2
  * rules_go to v0.24.2
  * protobuf to v3.13.0
  * bazel-gazelle to v0.22.0
  * bazel-skylib to v1.0.3

See all commits: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/compare/v0.5...v0.6


```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

# https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_docker/#setup
# http_archive("io_bazel_rules_docker", ...)

http_archive(
    name = "io_bazel_rules_k8s",
    strip_prefix = "rules_k8s-0.6",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/archive/v0.6.tar.gz"],
    sha256 = "51f0977294699cd547e139ceff2396c32588575588678d2054da167691a227ef",
)

load("@io_bazel_rules_k8s//k8s:k8s.bzl", "k8s_repositories")

k8s_repositories()

load("@io_bazel_rules_k8s//k8s:k8s_go_deps.bzl", k8s_go_deps = "deps")

k8s_go_deps()
```

name: v0.5
body:
* Added a `.resolve` alias
* Corrected args used for `.replace` and `.describe`
* `.delete` now uses substituted template
* Now possible to override stamp inputs

* Dependency upgrades
  * nodejs to v2.0.1
  * rules_go to v0.23.6
  * protobuf to v3.12.4
  * grpc to v1.30.2
  * rules_docker to v0.14.3

See all 59 commits: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/compare/v0.4...23e6881


```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

# https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_docker/#setup
# http_archive("io_bazel_rules_docker", ...)

http_archive(
    name = "io_bazel_rules_k8s",
    strip_prefix = "rules_k8s-0.5",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_k8s/archive/v0.5.tar.gz"],
    sha256 = "773aa45f2421a66c8aa651b8cecb8ea51db91799a405bd7b913d77052ac7261a",
)

load("@io_bazel_rules_k8s//k8s:k8s.bzl", "k8s_repositories")

k8s_repositories()

load("@io_bazel_rules_k8s//k8s:k8s_go_deps.bzl", k8s_go_deps = "deps")

k8s_go_deps()
```

name: Fixes to v0.3 to make it fully python3 compatible
body:
* Update rules_go version along with grpc dependencies fix (#468)
* Update dependency com_google_protobuf to v3.10.1 (#465)
* Update rules_python commit hash to a610ace (#464)
* Migrate maven_jar usage to maven_install. maven_jar will be removed from Bazel 2.0. (#463)
* Make //k8s:reverser and //k8s:stamper PY2 and PY3 compatible (#461)

name: Switch rules_k8s to go-containerregistry
body:
# PRs that migrate the resolver from python to Go
* Remove python resolver (#459)
* Comment why the string resolver ignores all errors (#447)
* Go resolver should return strings as is on any kind of error (#446)
* Add resolver test case for empty YAML doc (#445)
* Support resolving YAML streams in Go resolver (#444)
* Use go-containerregistry API that supports schema 1 images in resolver (#442)
* Complete the implementation of the Go resolver (#435)

# Features

# Fixes
* Update bazel_skylib + rules_go (#458)
* Update dependency com_github_grpc_grpc to v1.24.3 (#456)
* Update rules_python commit hash to 230f6d1 (#454)
* update grpc + protobuf + go (#453)
* Update rules_python commit hash to f46e953 (#451)
* Update io_bazel_rules_docker commit hash to 7476c25 (#450)
* depset transitive expects sequence of depsets (#441)
* Update rules_python commit hash to 5aa465d (#439)
* Update io_bazel_rules_docker commit hash to 31f8a73 (#438)
* Update README for release v0.2 (#436)

name: First rules_k8s release. Use Bazel rules for interacting with Kubernetes configurations / clusters!
body:
# New Rules
* Kubectl via toolchains (#210)
* Add new kubectl toolchain rule (#206)

# Features
* Allow downloading prebuilt binary in kubectl toolchain (#253)
* Enable building kubectl hermetically as part of toolchain setup (#229)
* Kubectl via toolchains (documentation) (#226)
* Add resolver to k8s_defaults (#200)
* Allow project override (#187)
* Support kubectl --user (#148)
* Adds 'context' parameter to k8s_object (#138)
* Improve "not found" error message (#121) (#122)
* Make resolver a public property (#95) (#96)

# Fixes
* Documentation & refactoring for custom kubectl from source (#251)
* Reformat files and fix Bazel incompatible changes (#249)
* test only a few things on mac, its flaky (#247)
* use latest release of protobuf (#243)
* update pin to rules_proto (#241)
* adding license for toolchain BUILD file (#239)
* Update toolchain docs (#237)
* update flask version to remove security warning (#236)
* Update toolchain docs (#235)
* buildifier for objects.bzl (#230)
* Include __init__.py files (#228)
* Arbitrary arguments for k8s_objects (#225)
* Arbitrary args for kubectl (#224)
* Disabling controller e2e test till it is less flakey (#222)
* Remove kubectl toolchain execution platform constraint (#218)
* Use gcloud builds, and :latest-$USER (#217)
* Sprinkle some sleeps to try and improve e2e flakiness (#216)
* Fix getting the current cluster name in README.md (#214)
* kubectl via toolchains (continued) (#212)
* Adding contributors and reviewers (#211)
* Use build id and repo name in namespace to uniquify (#208)
* update pin to base images docker and rules docker (#205)
* Propagate arguments for implicit attributes to instantiated rules (#204)
* Update protobuf rules for examples (#203)
* Use kubectl describe foo name (#196)
* Add logic to generate bazel + gcloud container using rules_docker (#193)
* Exit the resolver if publishing fails (#188)
* update rules docker pin (#186)
* update docker rules pin again (#180)
*  update rules_docker pin  (#179)
* Unlock extra actions if "context" attribute is set (#170)
* Fix a typo: s/usre/user/ (#169)
* Use /usr/bin/env bash for more portable shebang lines (#168)
* Add user and context attrs to README.md (#166)
* Do not clean between build/test (#164)
* hotfix: upgrade gunicorn version for fixing vulnerability (#163)
* Add --allow_unused_images resolver flag (#161) (#162)
* add Prow build status to README.md (#160)
* remove Travis CI in favor of Prow (#159)
* pass visibility into k8s commands (#158)
* switch from native.git_repository to external git_repository (#157)
* Create gcloud-bazel image for running e2e tests (#156)
* Create a test-e2e.sh script which prow can run (#155)
* Add support options to README.md (#154)
* Create root-level OWNERS file (#153)
